name: SpaceDrifter
description:
The game is a simple shooter where you drift around as a small spaceship and shoot expanding orbs. The orbs grow until they explode into red bullets that will destroy you if you're hit, and lead to a game over.

As you try to get a higher score the difficulty will increase. There will also be "black holes" that are drawn to you as you are to them, and that curve all bulletpaths around it.

It's my first game and it's made directly in java. Any feedback is appreciatet!

Controls:

Left and right arrow keys to turn.

Space to shoot (if in manual mode).

R to restart if game is lost.

Escape key to open the pause-menu.
